message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  This is my first offer, so you can't do better.
I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's be fair, but also keep in mind the money will be worth less with each round. This is a good compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a larger share. Let's be reasonable, Bob.  We're both losing money with each round, and my losses are greater than yours. This is a fair compromise.
